SELECT A.PRJT_CODE , A.CLIENT_CODE , C.CLIENT_NAME , A.PRJT_NAME , A.USER_NAME , A.USER_TEL , A.USER_CELL , A.USER_EMAIL , A.SALES_USER , A.REF_URL , A.SALES_TYPE_CODE , A.SALES_STATUS , A.REMK , D.KORN_NM FROM T_SALES_PROJECT A, T_SALES_CLIENT C, T_SYTM_USER D WHERE A.CLIENT_CODE = C.CLIENT_CODE AND A.SALES_USER = D.EMP_NO
AND C.CLIENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CLIENT_NAME} ,'%')
AND A.INPT_DTTM BETWEEN #{SCHD_FDATE_FORMAT} AND #{SCHD_TDATE_FORMAT} ORDER BY A.INPT_DTTM DESC
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(PRJT_CODE),'') AS PRJ_CODE FROM T_SALES_PROJECT WHERE PRJT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{CURR_DATE} , '%')
SELECT PRJT_CODE , SCHD_CODE , FILE_ID , FILE_SEQ , SAVE_FILE_NM , OTXT_FILE_NM , FILE_SIZE , FILE_TYPE , FILE_PATH_NM FROM T_SALES_FILE WHERE PRJT_CODE = #{PRJT_CODE}

SELECT SEQ_NO , CLIENT_CODE , CLIENT_NAME , ADDR_BASIC , ADDR_DTL , ZIP_NUMB , TELP_NUMB , HOME_URL , CLIENT_PIC , CLIENT_TYPE FROM T_SALES_CLIENT WHERE 1=1
AND CLIENT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CLIENT_CODE} ,'%')
AND CLIENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CLIENT_NAME} ,'%')
